title: Eternity Band - Platinum 'Shubha Sanketham'
materials: meticulously crafted with a high polish finish. Features a central cluster of brilliant-cut diamonds
totaling approximately 0.5 carats. Diamonds are graded for VS clarity and G color for maximum brilliance.
features: This modern band design, symbolizes the promise of 'Shubha Sanketham' (auspicious beginnings), features a flush setting of diamonds within a platinum bezel. The sleek, minimalist style provides a contemporary contrast, making it versatile for everyday wear. The band itself is crafted with a strong, clean design for lasting durability.
colors: Platinum silver and brilliant white diamonds
creating a timeless and sophisticated color palette.
occasions: or a token of everlasting commitment. Suitable for modern celebrations and everyday wear.
description: Crafted from premium platinum and meticulously set with high-quality diamonds, this ring embodies modern elegance. Its sleek design ensures comfort and longevity, making it a cherished symbol of love and commitment. The 'Shubha Sanketham' symbolism adds a layer of auspiciousness and meaningfulness, making it a unique treasure.
